hint: Mission: The scale is tipped. Calculate the sum of the sequence from 1 to 100 to restore equilibrium.
Mission: Interrogate the suspects. Only one speaks the truth; the others are wolves. Find the outlier.
Mission: Locate the missing piece. It is simply hiding in the footer. Look closely at 'home'.
Mission: Master the gravity. Toggle the Red and Blue fields to guide the falling star to its goal.
